footer.madeContinued: This is a capstone project for our Software Engineering degrees.

location.text: Proyecto Final - Instituto Tecnológico de Buenos Aires (ITBA)
location.aria: Learn more about the Instituto Tecnológico de Buenos Aires (ITBA)

meta.title: Homepage
meta.description: Smart NFTs, create, deploy, test, and view a custom NFT contract in just minutes. Mint tokens and share them with the world. A project by Florencia Petrikovich and Gonzalo Hirsch.

hero.title: Create, deploy, and interact with your custom NFT contract in just minutes

learnMore.aria: Learn more about the possible options you have

create.text: Use our simple editor to create your custom NFT in just minutes (or seconds!). Choose among multiple extensions and define your metadata according to industry standards in just a few clicks. Create, deploy, and verify your very own custom ERC-721 contract. Don't know how to code? Don't worry! For starters, this is a zero-code environment, and everything has explanations. Don't want to deploy it with us? We've got you covered! Create the contract and download it for further customizations or deployment.

edit.text: Already have an existing contract you created with us? Use this option to continue working on it (or make some edits if you are coming back). Our contracts can be edited, deployed, and verified an infinite number of times. We even let you edit metadata fields after deploying the contract.

interact.text: After deploying your contract, you can interact with it (and no wallet is required!). The only thing you need is your contract ID. Mint tokens, read contract data and write to the contract itself. Everything is in real-time and without costly gas fees. All minted NFTs are visible in Etherscan and OpenSea, and if you make yourself the owner of the contract, you can even create your OpenSea collections with us.

view.text: After minting NFTs, the only thing left to do is view them. Access all your minted tokens with our 'View' page; just put the contract ID, and we'll load all your NFTs (along with their metadata). All created NFTs will show the metadata you defined for them, along with the image and options to view the raw data (in case you are a developer or just curious). We'll provide the links to OpenSea and Etherscan so that you share your tokens with the world (and your friends).

wallet.title: No Wallet
wallet.description: No setup is needed to create or interact with the contracts!

gas.title: No Gas Fees
gas.description: No Ethereum or upfront fees are required to use this application!

coding.title: No Coding
coding.description: Zero coding is required to create the contract or mint NFTs!

step.title: Step by step explanations
step.description: Each option has a guide, and changes become visible seconds after making them.

simple.title: Simple and Quick
simple.description: In less than 5 minutes, you can have your custom ERC721 smart contract deployed, verified, and ready to start minting tokens with custom metadata.

centralized.title: All in One
centralized.description: You can find everything you might need here! Creation, compilation, verification, adding metadata, contract interaction, and your own NFT gallery.

contract.empty: Start by completing the contract name and symbol...
contract.deploy: Your contract is deployed on address:

error.nameUsed: Name for property already in use

deploy.title: Deploy Contract
deploy.message: Your contract is now deployed on address {0}. You will be able to see it in the blockchain (it may take a couple of minutes for the block to be mined). You can now verify it, but please wait until the contract is visible. If you edit the contract, you will have to deploy it again.
deploy.error: Error deploying contract. If the Smart NFTs' address is out of gas, please contact the owners of the site, otherwise the transaction hash will provide more information if used in Etherscan.

verify.title: Verify Contract
verify.message: Your contract is now verified. Be mindful, if you edit the contract you will have to deploy it and verify it again.
verify.error: Error verifying contract. If the contract was deployed in the last 5 minutes, please verify the transaction is mined on Etherscan and try again.

email.title: Contract Reminder
email.message: You should receive an email, it might take a couple of minutes. Check your spam folder just in case.
email.inputMessage: We'll send a reminder email with your contract ID. Be careful which email you choose, you can send reminders every 8hs.
email.error: Error sending email, you exceeded the allowed quota per contract. Quota is one email every 8 hours.

loading.initial: Input your contract ID to load it's methods.
loading.initialMethods: Contract methods will appear here once loaded.

error.contractNotDeployed: Contract has not been deployed yet
error.transactionMoreInfo: For more information click on the following transaction hash.

parameters.name: Name can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscore (_)
parameters.symbol: Symbol can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscore (_)
parameters.metadataName: This field can only contain letters, numbers, and _
parameters.max20: This field can have a maximum of 20 characters
parameters.boost_percentage: Invalid percentage, must be between 0 and 100 (without %)
parameters.string: Invalid text, maximum length is 256 characters.
parameters.long_string: Invalid text, maximum length is 700 characters.

placeholder.image: Drop the image here or click here to select it...
placeholder.long_string: Long text - Write your long text here

balance.title: Balance
balance.lowBalance: The wallet is running out of Ethereum

contribute.addBalance: Does it show a low balance, or do you want to add Ethereum to the Smart NFTs wallet? Go to the Faucet and follow the instructions to request Ethereum for the Smart NFTs account.
contribute.disclaimer: Do not transfer real Ethereum into the displayed wallet address; it can result in irrecoverable losses. We are not responsible for any transactions you make.

errors.copyAddress: Couldn't copy wallet address to clipboard.

meta.title: Status
meta.description: View the status of our services, wallet address, and account balance.

hero.subtitle: We couldn't find the page you were looking for, please go back home and start over.

meta.description: The page you are looking for doesn't exist.

hero.title: 500 - Internal Error
hero.subtitle: There was an internal error, check the backend status in case our services are down, otherwise please go back home and start over
